tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Words can't express the love and appreciation I have in my heart for you Doctor Namita.You are just next to the god for our family,we are so blessed to have a doctor like you throughout my pregnancy,I am that much satisfied with your treatment.And at last I would say many thanks,I know it's not enough but yes the summary I have is the god gift my Son 'Chaitanya' as a happy and healthy baby, Really so happy after getting safe delivery.we can't put into words our gratitude for everything you have done for our family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My experience with the doctor was exceptional. She was incredibly supportive and dedicated, always ensuring that I had ample time for consultation. I was admitted for delivery, which turned out to be complicated. However, she arrived promptly at night and provided the necessary care that saved both my baby and me. Her actions were nothing short of miraculous, and I feel I can never truly repay her for what she has done. Thanks a lot

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We are incredibly grateful for the care and support provided by Dr Namita throughout our pregnancy. She has a very warm demeanour and provides all the reassurances. Throughout my pregnancy, I would worry over any spikes in my scans and reports and like a mother she would scold us not to take any stress and that the worry was hers and not ours and that she would take care of everything. She encouraged me to stay active and do the right exercises at the right time. Even after some complications like cord around the neck, our doctor managed a normal delivery keeping all the safety checks in mind and we trusted her judgement completely.My family was quite impressed with the doctor and her team and how they managed the whole labour and delivery and the post delivery care. We couldnâ€™t have asked for a better OBG, and we recommend her to everyone seeking exceptional prenatal care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Started Consulting Dr Namita Kapoor after 34 week of pregnancy due to bad experience from previous doctor. After a long search and reading lot of reviews we got some confidence to meet and discuss our next course of action. Since day one we got good confidence on her and with every visit this confidence level increased and we decided to proceed for rest of the process with Dr. Namita Kapoor (with a regret why we didn't choose her since start). 

We liked the suggestions and the process she follows for whole consulting process to keep it as Natural as possible. And even when other doctors starts scaring with few natural minor complications like in our case for 1 loop round the neck and other doctors were scaring and forcing us to plan early delivery (cesarean post 32 week or 36 week max) because of this which was not necessary. 

Dr. Namita checked all the previous scans and reports and said because of this there is no need to plan early delivery. we can still wait till last day (with monitoring baby movements at home) and still Normal delivery can be tried. In case baby do not come down and heartbeat fluctuates while trying then on last day last option will be caesarean otherwise most of the cases Normal delivery is possible. We were convinced with the way she told at least she is still trying for normal delivery and there can be chance we can have baby delivered without caesarean. 

On the Day of delivery. She tried her level best to get baby delivered normally but we can see that every time its tried the baby heartbeat was fluctuating. So considering 2 complications (loop around the neck and baby poop in womb) and heartbeat fluctuation while trying for normal delivery we have to go for emergency caesarean delivery or it will be risk to the baby that we can understand. 

Our satisfaction was like Doctor tried her level best for normal delivery that was enough for us to still keep on continuing with Dr. Namita for any of our future need. She is great doctor and this kind of attitude and skills are rare nowadays. I highly recommend Dr Namita to anyone who is really concerned about Normal and Natural process and avoid unnecessary intervention. She has great history of Normal delivery even in some complicated cases with great knowledge and skills.

Special thanks to Dr. Namita Kapoor for all the support and taking care of what is needed. I would like to thanks Columbia Asia Hospital too for the seamless process and good arrangements made during the process. And last but not the least thanks to the hospital staff for full support at any time round the clock.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I consulted Dr. Namita for my pregancy journey from my 3rd month due to her vast experience and high recommendation from my friends. She explains every issue very nicely and talks to the point. My consultation experience with her was very nice from starting till now after the delivery.Delivery experience: My edd was 10th june and i did not got natural pains till 9th june so doctor advised me to get admitted the next day for induced pain but i wanted to wait for natural pains and discussed the same with her. She told you can wait few more days if you want but get regular nst and ultrasound scans. We followed the same for next 3 days, everything was normal and i got natural pain on 4th day. Got admitted in hospital and i was only 2 cm dialated, we got to know that baby has passed stool in the womb as we waited post edd. There was panic in OT as there were chances that baby might get infected if he consumes the stool. So doctor told me that she would try for normal delivery for next 30 mins but if baby heartbeat fluctuates then we will go for caserian birth. Thankfully i was fully dialated in next 20 mins and baby heartbeat was constant. Dr. Namita closely monitored everything and took right decisions at that time. I had very smooth natural delivery within 1 hour of getting admitted in hospital. She is very experienced and talented in this field and i would highly recommend everyone to consult her for delivery.I would be thankful to her for my entire life for this normal delivery in such panic situation. She is the best in her field. Thank you so much doctor for this good care and advice.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I consulted Doctor in my 6th month of Pregnancy. I came back to Bangalore from my hometown and was in search of a good doctor who is also inclined towards normal delivery. I had heard all kinds of horror stories about doctors being in hurry and opt for C-section. 
I read good reviews about Dr. Namita online and decided to see her once and then take my call. Trust me, after meeting her first time itself, my worries were all gone and I became extremely assured for my rest of the pregnancy journey, and I was right :)
Dr. Namita talks to the point and explains everything in detail. If you've done some research & know things in medical terms, then also she will be happy about it and explains rest of it, unlike other doctors who get offended  (I don't understand why). 
She takes care of the baby like her own till the end. Her positive attitude towards everything calms you down instantly. The tests and the medications are to the point. She does not suggest to go for meds unless really needed. She shares her number later in Pregnancy for the doubts or any emergency and responds via whatsapp too. In fact, post delivery too.

I was so relaxed throughout my pregnancy as I knew I was in safest hands. I could focus on my diet, exercises and baby:) And my baby was delivered Vaginally.  I am so grateful to Dr. Namita for delivering my baby safe & sound and treating this pregnancy like her own:) Thanks Dr. for everything!!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I wanted to write about Dr. Namita Kapoor and even though I am busy coping up with my newborn. I could not control writing about this kind, genuine, honest doctor unlike other big doctors, She will be available 24x7 on text messages and whatsapp in case you have any issues. You can reach out to her and she is very prompt in her response. I was lucky to have chosen her for my pregnancy and i can say it was my nice decision. I fall short of  wards telling about her but definitely i suggest all the pregnant women to consult Dr. Namita Kapoor to make their pregnancy  a beautiful  experience !! My Birth story goes like this .
I was admitted on 1st July  in the morning  due to some complications and chances for normal vs C-section  was 50-50 but Dr. aim was to induce a normal delivery while while constantly accessing  the baby growth and risk parameters. Closer towards the delivery she ensured close monitoring and always available on the call. In the afternoon at 3:40 pm i was blessed with the baby girl via normal delivery. Even if i say 1000 times thanks to her it is less. I will always be very very grateful to her and she is the most amazing gynecologists' i have ever met.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I began my consultation with Dr Namita in October 2020, when I conceived for the second time. I had a previous IUD at 39 weeks with a different doctor, so it was really important for me to find an experienced and skilled doctor to manage my high risk pregnancy. During my 2nd trimester, my NT scan indicated a possible anomaly. This period was really stressful and scary but Dr. Namita was calm and practical. She explained the implications and possible outcomes, guided us on the next steps and recommended us to to the best tertiary scan centre (BFMC) and doctor (Dr. Prathima). 

Throughout the pregnancy, Dr. Namita was forthcoming, caring and transparent. I had fluctuating glucose levels throughout my pregnancy and she provided timely advice on action to be taken and experts to be consulted with. Her aim was to induce a normal delivery while constantly assessing the baby's growth and risk parameters. Closer towards the delivery, she ensured close monitoring and was always available on call. I had a normal delivery and I was blessed with my bundle of joy in May this year. I'm so deeply grateful to Dr. Namita for her calm demeanour, transparency and decisiveness. Thank you so much, you're a God send :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We started consultation with Dr. Namita after I discovered that I have a large fibroid in my regular pre conception visit. Right from the beginning ( before conceiving ) she gave us a  detailed explanation of how and why the fibroid causes issues in conception and pregnancy.  But she said we should go ahead and try to conceive because there is no point in trying to remove the fibroid and then planning. If it causes any issues then we could discuss removal. Luckily we got pregnant within a month , she constantly kept check on the fibroid and prescribed medicines to avoid pre term labor. She was always pro normal delivery in my case , but ultimately had to induce labor at 38 weeks due to high BP and IHCP . Labor unfortunately did not progress as expected so had to choose a C section . Overall could not have asked for a better Dr for my first pregnancy

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I did my entire consultation post conceiving with doctor Namita and trusted her judgement and prescriptions blindly. Having read positive reviews about her and proximity of the hospital from our home, we decided to start the consultations with her and it was a pretty good decision. Dr Namita is very straight forward and we'll experienced. My whole experience was smooth and just by following her advice for being active, my delivery was normal. She motivates a lot for natural labor and my whole labor and delivery experience was satisfying. I was able to deliver normally with a minor vaginal tear.
Post delivery also she motivated me to be on my feet and not to stress about weakness and to focus on recovery.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr namita is great in the field of obs & gyn. Its been 5 months i delivered my baby. I was consulting her since pre conception checkup. She is straightforward and recommends what is good for us, she made sure that I don't panic and always made sure to ask if i have any questions regarding anything related to pregnancy, since it was our first baby. I trusted my doctor very much. She asked me to stay active, suggested activites for normal delivery. She never questioned about early delivery, and  definitely tried her best for normal delivery, but due to fetal distress had to go for emergency c-sec. Even post delivery, she was always there to check on me. On the next day of delivery she herself came in to help me walk. She is quite caring. I would hands down recommend Dr Namita for pregnancies and delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Namita Kapoor Sahgal made my pregnancy and delivery so pleasant. In an age when operative births are more common than vaginal deliveries, Namita Ma'am encouraged me for vaginal delivery and made my experience so comfortable. Ma'am never caused me unnecessary stress or ordered unnecessary tests. She made my pregnancy journey a seamless and natural process and put me at ease each time I had any questions. She cared for me like my mother and encouraged me a lot in the labour room. Her care for patients doesn't stop at delivery and she continues to care post delivery as well. Without any doubts I would recommend Namita Ma'am for pregnancies and delivery as well as any other women health issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Maternal Care/ Checkup,Pregnancy Check Up,
review:
I went to Dr Namita since very starting of my pregnancy. She has always been straightforward with her explanations. The best part about her is she will never write you unnecessary medicines and tests and let your pregnancy grow naturally as much possible. Doctor will be upfront in explaining you all your doubts. She let me wait for my labor pain to start till my due date. Thankfully my labor started on due date and we could try for normal delivery. Dr. Namita supported me and waited for normal delivery but baby's head was not fixed so as per need of the hour, we went for c- sec with no regrets and clear understanding. 
Definety Dr. Namita is my go to person for any queries related to this field. I would recommend my friends and family to consult her without a giving a second thought.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I consulted her when my wife tested pregnant.  Unknowingly my wife ate some antibiotics during conceiving period and that antibiotic sometime affect faetus growth, First we were consulting other doctor and she made us stressful and scare us about that. Then we  consulted Dr. Namitha kapoor for second opinion and she explained everything nicely and gave us hope and confidence to proceed further. And from there my wife continued her treatment with Dr. Namita, She is very caring and always make her patient stress free. It was very smooth journey and she aim for normal delivery and so my wife got normal delivery and baby is healthy. She is very experienced, calm and composed.  She is highly recommended. And big thanks from me and my wife.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I started consulting Dr.Namita right from when we started planning our pregnancy. Had a wonderful experience throughout. She is very calm and does not let you panic even in case of a complication. She tries her best to let you have a normal delivery(personal experience and so many other reviews say so too). Feels like talking to a family member when consulting her. She shared her number with me in the third trimester and was very responsive on phone as well. Love her attitude. Sincere thanks to Namita ma'am for helping me throughout my journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We had consulted Dr. Namita Kapoor for our first pregnancy and we are thus very pleased and satisfied from the beginning by her approach, behaviour and explanation. She was very professional and always advised for the normal delivery since our condition was favorable for normal delivery. She also advised prenatal exercise and never rushed for the delivery date. She always prefer to wait till the last expected date of delivery. But due to some other unavoidable situation we had to go for a C section and it went very smoothly under the skilled hand of Dr. Namita kapoor. The procedure and post delivery issues got minimized very quickly and we both were completely satisfied by the warmth and care Dr has shown towards our pre and post delivery time period. 
I would strongly recommend Dr Namita Kapoor to all expecting mothers.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
context: Pregnancy with PCOD,Pregnant Women Counseling,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Normal Delivery,
review:
It's been a wonderful journey. Where to begin. After confirmation on pregnancy, we looked for different doctors and went through countless reviews. Dr Namita is highly rated and well known for normal deliveries and pre and post-delivery counselling. We visited her when I was in my second trimester. 
She is very clear about her instructions and as time went by we mostly met her through video chat. Because of her guidance, all went smoothly without any medical complications. Later in the stage, she gave me moral support and encourage me to go for normal delivery. 
Finally, The lucky day came and we were blessed with a beautiful baby girl. I would like to thank Dr Namita and her team for their support and guidance throughout my pregnancy journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We consulted Dr Namitha for my wife's first pregnancy and we are blessed with a baby boy via normal delivery. Since the beginning she had been very supportive, guiding and encouraging us to have a healthy pregnancy and normal delivery. She had continuously monitored the foetal health and mother's health by several ultrasound scans and other tests. *** ***** ********** *********** ***** *** ****** She is very strict in her job and very friendly while giving valuable suggestions and clearing our doubts. Finally she did normal delivery inspite of unfavourable conditions. We are very happy that we choose her and we strongly recommend Dr Namitha.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: This was my second pregnancy, my first was  c sec, so I wan't sure what will happen this time(i so wanted normal delivery)  ,but Dr.  namita made me understand all prons and corns of what will happen if I be persistent of what I wanted. thank fully we agreed to Dr. course of action and went for the prescribed process with no complications and health ðŸ‘¶.  Dr. is very friendly and polite  understand your needs and requirements and than tells your course of action. a lot have changed in 5 years of my first pregnancy and it's all good Coze of Dr. like Dr. namita.  thanks a lot ma'am. God bless and cheers!!!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I had miscarriage during first pregnancy and then i got struck with really bad doc who took advantage of the situation and i had almost every test within next 3 4 months..
THANK GOD i met Namita , she comforted me and suggested to go for natural pregnancy instead of opting for some another method ** *********** ****** honestly i really wanted to hear it out and after 3 months i was pregnant and then she handled my case, it all went fine , Thanks a lot Mam for giving me hope that i really needed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Namita is very experienced and friendly doctor. She attends to each and every detail. She has a very good network of doctors. I had lot of issues during pregnancy. She was quick to diagnose what monitoring I need. Knowing the intricacies of hospital functions, she helped me get scans and tests done from the best doctors. She is very approachable when needed. In my case towards the end of the pregnancy, we had to be very careful. She was very vigilant and helped me to be as well. I highly recommend the doctor to anyone.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I consulted Dr Namita Kapoor Sahgal from the beginning of my pregnancy. I am highly satisfied with her guidance. She was always pro for Normal delivery and i am extremely grateful to her for her support and guidance that i was able to deliver a healthy baby - and i had Normal delivery. She never prescribed unnecessary medications, also she encouraged me to stay active and on my feet throughout my pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I visited Dr. Namita during 4th month of pregnancy. Cant thank her enough for all the positivity she had given me during my pregnancy. I used to worry even about very small issues but she always encouraged  me to be a happy and because of her I started enjoying my pregnancy and gave birth to a healthy and beautiful baby.

After making the appointment, when we came here they told there's no appointment booked and made us wait for 2+ hours for consultation. I got a message saying appointment is confirmed. Then why should I wait for 2hours??? The staff is saying don't book in practo then wats the use of your app???

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We are consulting  Dr Namita Kapoor for my wife from first trimester. We want to thank you from the bottom of our hearts for taking wonderful care of us (my wife and baby) during her pregnancy and delivery. She was so anxious at her delivery day and she gave up for normal delivery and we recommended for c section but it was you who gave us the hope for which she is able to deliverer normally. Thanks again Dr. Namita kapoor, you made our day.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),
review:
I started consulting doctor from my second trimester. From the beginning, doctor gave genuine feedback regarding diet and babyâ€™s development. She was very professional and advised to do prenatal exercise at appropriate time and pushed for normal delivery. Had anytime approachable attitude from 7th month for emergency. She waited until the actual labour. Had a smooth normal delivery and regular follow ups for examination.

I would recommend Dr.Namita Kapoor Mam to all expecting mothers.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I went her for my wife. We have been consulting dr Namita from the very beginning of pregnancy. The best part about her is - she will never write unnecessary medicines and tests and let your pregnancy grow natural. She will help you to go for natural delivery with a clear understanding of involved risks if there is any. You will enjoy every consultation as she is very friendly and clears your doubts properly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnant,Vaginal Infection,Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy,White Discharge Problem,

We 1st consulted any doctor was her online and thereafter had never had to look behind.We had our Angel Baby on 25th Feb,2021 and the day I will never forget. thank you so much mam!!Tania ,our Angel & Soumik

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

Especially during labor, even in emergency situation, she acted wisely and helped me to deliver the baby normally. My sincere thanks to Dr. Namita for making my first pregnancy memorable and trouble free.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

Loved her friendly behaviour. She won't suggest unnecessary treatments and medications. Will listen to you carefully and give you the treatment which is best for you. 

She has been my angel in disguise throughout my journey.

Thank you mam from the bottom of my ðŸ’–.

I will definitely recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Namita Kapoor is very friendly and makes you feel at ease irrespective of the problem. She also explains all the underlying facts in a very candid manner which made me feel very comfortable. She also responds to queries via texts once the pregnancy is in third trimester.

review: Providing proper guidance & suggesting regular/necessary checkupâ€™s. The feeling was like visiting a known friend and It was a smooth sail throughout our pregnancy till delivery. Very satisfied with the consultation. And will highly recommend for the consultation related to pregnancy.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
We had a very good experience with Dr. Namita. She gave us very good opinions and explanations to all our questions and concerns.
She is very professional and keeps complete transparency with the diagnosis. No last minute surprises. Because of her we had a normal delivery. We would highly recommend Dr. Namita.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Namita has treated me for a critical ectopic pregnancy back in 2014. She is a wonderful doctor. It was natural that I visited her again for my pregnancy last year. She is very helpful and was available throughout the  pregnancy. It was a normal delivery and her postive attitude helped me to withstand the pain and go through it. Ankita

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Have visited the doctor for my pregnancy checkup from day 1 for normal delivery.Doctor helped to achieve it by giving proper guidance.She is crisp and doesnt want unnecessary medicine to be taken.She is available on phone from 7 month onwards to solve all concerns.Will be recommending her to others for sure

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

A big thank you to her and I really recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: We have consulted dr.Namita from the start of my pregnancy till my delivery. Despite of her busy schedule she always listens to our queries. In this COVID situation she rightly knows when to meet in person and when should we consult online. If it is not necessary she never prescribe extra medicine. We wanted to have normal delivery. She guided at various points to help in acheiving the same. So I highly recommend dr. Namita. It   Was a very great experience with her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pregnancy care and management,
review: I visited her before my pregnancy. she helped and guide me through out my pregnancy. even during lockdown she was reachable in virtual mode. She advised best and did my normal delivery which is very rare these days. I take this opportunity to show my gratitude and respect for her.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: We consulted for pregnancy and recently we were blessed with a healthy baby.  She is very approachable, caring, supportive and proactive in her approach.  We were worried due to Covid situation but thankfully she was there for us.  Highly recommend her!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** ** *** **  *** **** ************* ** *********** She is very loving, caring, explains the issue thoroughly.. Her best part is that she tries her 100 percent for normal delivery.. I was lucky that she was my doctor throughout my pregnancy.. She made me feel that pregnancy is not heck .. I can be like a normal person.. Due to her advice, I went to office till last day of my pregnancy..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Good Experience. Mine was a high risk pregnancy with early IHCP and HSV1. The doctor was very clear with this right from start. She was supportive and hopeful that things would be fine. She kept me under close and frequent monitoring. Thanks to her, I delieverd normally after 37 weeks. She motivated throughout my pregnancy that helped me to keep stress at bay. She used to answer all the queries with great patience. She is transparent with her patients. I highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
This doctor in none less than an angel for us. She is the reason for the Ultima happiness which we are living these days. We were trying to conceive from last 1.5 years and all efforts were in vain but coming in contact with her was the big turning point of our life.She was with us in every stages right from planning baby ,prenatal care .She has always enocuraged us for normal delivery and she prefers that her patients have normal delivery.She was there with us even at 3:30 am when i was about to give birth.More over she doesnot gives any extra medicne or extra test just gives what is required so in that case she helps in saving money aswell only assisted us in successful conception and and also normal vaginal delivery which is so rare in these days.  Just because of her I have normal delivery and we feel blessed to have a baby in our life we are so grateful to her. Both the mumma and baby are doing fine in her guidance. I am falling short of the words for the happiness.
Swati

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ** *** ********* ******** We switched to Namita mam in 2nd trimester of pregnancy from other place andnit was total contrast experience. Namita mam did normal delivery which was big deal considering my situation and due to this my post recovery was very fast. Namita mam focuses on your well being and doesn't ask for unnecessary tests. Namita mam and her staff in Columbia Asia Varthur were very supportive and went out of their way to help us during the whole procedure of my daughter's birth. I recommend Namita mam to all my colleagues around.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Child Birth Education,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
Our experience with doctor very good, We were very satisfied with her service and care. When we planed our 2nd child we contacted doctor from our hometown and she remembered us and she guided us in every steps. She always gives enough time, listens you properly and clear your all doubts. Prescribes less medicines but some test which I feel better to have for more clarity. 
She always encourages for Normal delivery. Even I was scared and wanted to go for cesarean but she gave us enough strength and advice us for normal. 

We recommend Dr. Namita Mam 100%.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr Namita was very articulate from day 1 on explaining the status, dos & don't related to my pregnancy.

She helped me choose healthy lifestyle, basically a juxtaposition of excercise & food. The visits done with her showcased real care for me & my baby and were always a wonderful experience kinda " nice to meet you" one!

She has always encouraged me for normal pregnancy and the path forward towards it. Kind of a doctor who focuses less on medicine but more on emotional & nutritional health. Appreciate her efforts and forte in the field of pregnancy & my normal delivery.****** ** **** *** ****** ** *** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It was a traumatic experience and a complete disappointment to meet Dr. Namita Kapoor. 
 Unprofessional , Impolite and insensitive behaviour.
Recorded my case history **** * ******* ******** She did not bother to look at me while I explained my complaints. She barely examined me either. It felt she was in a rush to finish all her cases and leave. She was very much certain about my condition before even getting the test reports. I was traumatised as I anticipated the test reports which turned out to be an absolute negative. * ** ******* *********** ********* *** ** *** ***** ****** * ** *** **** **** *** ** ****** *** **** *********** ********** ****** *** ************* ******* ***** 

Please take time to read the review. It might save you a traumatic experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I consulted Dr Namita in 2018 for my first pregnancy, and had an excellent experience with her then. I consulted her again for my second pregnancy in 2020. This time it was a twin pregnancy. It wasn't easy having a pregnancy in the midst of corona lockdowns and restrictions. Having an expert doctor who I could trust completely helped me carry it through. Just like in the first pregnancy, she continued to have thorough consultations, and kept issues like my gestational diabetes in control. She is very proactive and helped avoid further issues.Â  Dr Namita is truly an expert at her work. She was a key factor in my being able to have smooth pregnancies at the ages of 42 and 44. Highly recommend her ! Thank you Dr Namita.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
First of all:
1. Doctor was late by 1 hour.
2.After she arrived in hospital, she just completed formality of looking after the patient.
3.she checked my wife in HURRY.and prescribed something
4.No friendliness observed.
5.Tone of talking was somewhat rude.Even by hearing her ,you will fear asking some health related doubts
6. No proper consultation given.It last for only 2 mins max .
7. For 2 mins ,fees charged is 600 RS.which is not at all worth.
8.She has prescribed one test.For getting opinion on the test report you need to pay extra,this was weired,usually it will included in the visit.
9.overall experience is BELOW GOOD level.
10.Will not recommend this doctor to our friends and family
Not at all good experience, first time visiting gynac expecting doctor would be calm and patient but found otherwise. Was like she was just trying to get to next patient.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I thank her for taking care of me and being so skilled at what she does. She put me at ease throughout my interaction.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Namita helped us a lot during this pandemic time and we blessed with baby boy. She really helped us and taken care of my wifeâ€™s complicated pregnancyâ€™s issues very well and reachable all the time when we needed her advice and help.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Good experience...listens carefully..full history recorded...future process to be followed also suggested....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Throughout my pregnancy experience was good. Dr. Namita is patient & answers all our queries with patience. She always insists for normal delivery. Overall we had a good experience.

I paid for the consultation *** *** *** ******* **** ******** ** ** ** ******* Dude even i waited for her almost 2 hours. Once we entered inside her clinic she is like hurry up. I have many more patients waiting outside. To see her face i paid 900 ? 

Cant we get that much good behaviour from her as a new patient? Very pathetic service. ** *** **** ***** ******** ******** * *** ***** ** * **** *******

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
Rude, Rude, Rude. 

I visited this Doctor with my Mom for what could be urinary Infection. Although she prescribed the medicine and tests to investigate the matter, all of us found her behavior to be very rude from the word go. I am not excepting unreasonably welcoming tone or vibe, but just be compassionate to your patients. She sounds and behaves in such arrogant manner that it feels demeaning just being in her cabin. 

I will never recommend her to anyone ever.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: We went for pre-pregnancy counselling after reading good reviews. *** ****** **** **** ********* ** *** it was like an interview she was continuously typing. Didnâ€™t felt her friendly.      Maybe she only speaks nicely with pregnant ladies and not to the one who is planning for pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Consulted her for twin pregnancy with gestational diabetes . I can say doctor does a great job and handles any risk of pregnancy no matter how risky it is. She is one the best doctor I have visited so far. She was very supportive throughout my pregnancy and during covid time also.
She closely watched and assessed all tests whichever necessary to rule out any risk and problem. I would strongly recommend her . I thank her from  bottom of my heart.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Namita is extremely helpful, friendly and kind hearted.Her treatment is excellent and the suggestions she gave during my pregnancy were helpful which lead to a healthy and smooth delivery. Treatment was so good that I recovered very fast post c section.Thanks a lot Mam - Sirisha

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: From the very first day of my pregnancy I was visiting Namita madam.she explained my health issues thoroughly in a detailed manner. she is very friendly and never hesitate to explain you if I  had any doubts or questions .Her support and guidance through out my pregnancy journey has helped me successfully  deliver a baby girl without any complications.Thank you so much madam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr. Namita comes across as a very learned and seasoned professional. She has a very friendly demeanor and made me feel very comfortable whenever i visited her. *** *** *** ********* *** *********** ********** ********** ** ********** Even during covid times, she kept following up with me during and post my delivery. I was very satisfied with her. I strongly recommend her for pregnancy care and normal delivery.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,

After getting treatment from her I was really very happy after my baby born my body recovery was very good
I'm very happy with dis Doctor

Thank you...

Thanks a lot Mam Regards Jyotsnamayee
